briefTitle: ALDH1A1 Expression in Invasive Mammary Carcinoma
officialTitle: ALDH1A1 as A Stem Cell Marker and Its Correlation With the Clinico-pathological Parameters in Invasive Mammary Carcinoma
primaryOutcomeMeasure: evaluate expression of ALDH1A1 in invasive mammary carcinoma
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with invasive mammary carcinoma carcinoma and underwent surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* Cases received pre-operative chemotherapy or radiotherapy.
* Cases with insufficient clinical data.
